name: Miss Love 爱人错过
description:
The game itself is a casual flying shooter. Inspired by the stage play of the same name, "The Love That Misses" (Wang Hao, Shi Ce), I created this game.

WASD/directional keys - move

J - shoot

Esc - Menu

Enter - Confirm

As you can see in the Youtube video, due to the build of WebGL, a lot of the post-processing effects and HDR shaders that I produced did not get rendered. In order to faithfully present my original intended visuals, I strongly recommend that you download the PC version. You can see a large number of lighting effects from under the Unity URP pipeline, such as glow.

Font - Quirlycues

Asset - Kenney Character Assets https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-character-assets#/

SFX - MixKit https://mixkit.co/

BGM - Somewhere in times, AccuseFive & MixKit https://mixkit.co/
